controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program provide for verification of KYC information using reliable and independent electronic data?
Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to assess the accuracy of electronic data used for verification?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you assess data accuracy

controls.label: Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to assess the security of electronic data sources used for verification?
controls.detail-label: Describe the security assessment criteria you apply

controls.label: Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to assess how frequently electronic data is kept up-to-date?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you evaluate data currency and update frequency

controls.label: Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to assess the comprehensiveness of electronic data (including the range of persons and collection period)?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you evaluate data comprehensiveness

controls.label: Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to verify that electronic data has been obtained from a reliable and independent source?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you verify source reliability and independence

controls.label: Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to confirm whether electronic data is maintained by a government body or pursuant to legislation?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you verify government or legislative basis for data sources

controls.label: Has your program established risk-based systems and controls to determine whether electronic data can be additionally authenticated?
controls.detail-label: Describe the authentication methods you support or assess

controls.label: Has your program established and documented which reliable and independent electronic data sources you will use for verifying KYC information?
controls.detail-label: List the electronic data sources your program uses for verification

controls.label: Has your program established pre-defined tolerance levels for accepting matches and managing errors in electronic verification results?
controls.detail-label: Describe your tolerance levels and error thresholds

controls.label: Has your program established a procedure to independently confirm KYC information by contacting the person the customer claims to be, where appropriate?
controls.detail-label: Describe when and how you conduct independent confirmation contact

groups.description: Systems and controls to evaluate whether electronic data meets reliability and independence criteria.
